features: 🚩Unique Car Ramp Toy Set: Rather than common ramp racer toys with only 1 parking lot and few slides, our race car track toy for 2 year old boy and girl is specially designed with 2 parking lots, 6 bright colored ramps and 3 garages (a gas station, a repair shop, an auto detailing studio), which simulates real-life traffic situation. Little racing drivers enjoy the visual sense and the thrill of racing!

🚩2 Drivers Play Together: Two parking lots for two kids! Release cars at the top parking lot then slide them down the rainbow toddler race track! When the game stops, the toddlers can collect the cars in the garages or simulate the car refueling by themselves. 6 mini cars are enough for 2 kids to play together. Double Fun!

🚩Montessori Toys for 2-3 Year Old: This toddler race track is a simple and well-built toy. It will encourage the development of your toddler's hand-eye coordination and increase attention span. Also, encourages toddlers to cooperate and take turns to play their race cars. For the smallest children such as a 2 year old boy or girl, they can learn dexterity and repetition through playing. They will love this gift and play with parents or friends for hours.

🚩Gifts for Toddlers: The toy car ramp can be easily taken apart, assembled and stored on a shelf. Kids may like to decorate it with stickers. Suitable for toddlers playing at home indoors or as an outdoor activity. Packed in a sturdy colorful box, the cute toddler toy is a perfect choice as a birthday gift for 2 3 year old boys, a Christmas gift for toddlers!

🚩Mom's Priority Choice: The car ramp toy is made of high quality ABS material, BPA Free and stained with bright non-toxic water-based paint. Fully tested to the highest U.S. ASTM F 963 toy safety standards, the vehicles have passed the tensile tests and small parts tests. No concerns about wheels falling off or pieces coming apart. We also equipped with the assembly video for your reference. The car is large enough not to be a suffocation risk even you buy it as gifts for 2 year old boys girls.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Upgraded Montessori Toys Unlike an ordinary ramp racer, it includes 6 car ramps and 6 mini cars. This car race track is a good choice. Your kids can gain knowledge while playing, enhancing your relationship with them.

Endless Fun for Toddlers Ideal Toys for Kids Age 18 Months Above Bright colors of car ramps can improve children's color recognition ability. The car sliding down the track can improve baby's tracking and hand-eye coordination ability.

Improving Visual Tracking Allow toddlers to fully enjoy the race while learning through playing and promote hand-eye coordination, thinking and attention skills. Racing Competition Track cars can start from the 2 top parking lots of the car slide at the same time. Kids push the car to give the ramp racers a full acceleration, letting cars run faster and farther.

Sturdy Base The widened base of car ramp toy is made of stable ABS material, which can firmly support the tracks above, allowing the car to slide easily. Smooth Edges Without Burrs The material on the edge of the toddler toy is smooth, protecting the toddler's small hands. All the details we have for the toddler to fully consider, great as a 2 year old boy and girl gifts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheap plastic but great entertainment value!
reviews.reviewText: This was a pain to put together. The plastic is on the cheap side but it’s still going after a month of play. The kids (5 kids 3 and under) absolutely love watching the cars go down the ramps. The price was pretty ok too. If you want a toy like this, I would suggest getting a wooden one that’s sturdier. Otherwise this one does the job just fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun and simple
reviews.reviewText: My daughter is big in the cars so we got this for her. She’s been having a blast with it. It’s fairly easy to put together. It’s all just plastic pieces. She likes at the garage doors open and can put the cars in there.Cons:• Comes apart easily and toddlers like to take it apart on purpose just to have you put it back together constantly.• All plasticPros:• comes with a lot of cars• easy to put together• gender neutral• storage for cars on the toy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I regret buying this for my toddler. He really does like the concept of the cars going down the track, but it is very cheaply made. The plastic is flimsy and the top pieces don’t stay on at all. So anytime he picks it up, it all falls apart. I wish I would have just gotten a full wooden set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A load of fun!
reviews.reviewText: I got this gift for my Grandson for Christmas. He wanted it put together right away and had a ton of fun with it! It works as shown and expected. It was a little bit disappointing because the parts are cheaply made and the little cars are not of good quality but it did a good job for a two-year-old.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super fun toy! My daughter loves it. It was very important to follow the directions to put it together so the cars go the right direction. It does come off the bottom piece somewhat easily if my daughter knocks it over.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The track is not sturdy and once assembled the top part keeps coming off. Did not return it since kid got it for Christmas and seems to love it. Not worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 2 Year Old Loves It!!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a gift for a 2 year old who loves cars and he's obsessed with it. The sticker pack is super cute!!! Easy to put together. Needed a little elbow grease to get the track into the designated slots but it's all good!Just make sure when you get the cars that the wheels are clicked into the metal rod. I had a couple that wouldn't go all the way down the track but realized they were just crooked but a simple fix!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s my fault for not paying attention to what I was purchasing, but this version is nowhere near what my nephew had, which was a nice wooden version of this so when I purchased this and opened it, it was nothing like what I was expecting. It is definitely cheap plastic that doesn’t stay together and the cars are perfect size for my one-year-old to choke on them. The only reason I gave it two stars is because it is my fault for not paying attention to what I was Buying. Highly don’t recommend get the wooden version instead
